com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform

Interface CloudPlatform

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScpCfCloudPlatform, ScpNeoCloudPlatform

    public interface CloudPlatform
    CloudPlatform interface to provide common platform features.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getApplicationName()
      Get the application name.
      String getApplicationProcessId()
      Get the process ID of the current application.
      String getApplicationUrl()
      Get the application url.
      default SSLContext getSslContext()
      Convenience for PlatformSslContextProvider#tryGetContext.
      default void setEnvironmentVariableReader(Function<String,String> reader)
      Set a custom function to read environment variables with.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationName

        @Nonnull
String getApplicationName()
                            throws CloudPlatformException
        Get the application name.
        Returns:
        The name of the application.
        Throws:
        CloudPlatformException - If there is an error accessing the application name.

      • getApplicationUrl

        @Nonnull
String getApplicationUrl()
                           throws CloudPlatformException
        Get the application url.
        Returns:
        The URL of the current application.
        Throws:
        CloudPlatformException - If there is an error accessing the application url.

      • getApplicationProcessId

        @Nonnull
String getApplicationProcessId()
                                 throws CloudPlatformException
        Get the process ID of the current application.
        Returns:
        The process ID.
        Throws:
        CloudPlatformException - If there is an error accessing the process ID.

      • getSslContext

        @Nonnull
 @Beta
default SSLContext getSslContext()
                                          throws CloudPlatformException
        Convenience for PlatformSslContextProvider#tryGetContext.
        Returns:
        A platform provided SSLContext.
        Throws:
        CloudPlatformException - if the SSL Context could not be created.
        See Also:
        PlatformSslContextProvider.tryGetContext()

      • setEnvironmentVariableReader

        @Beta
default void setEnvironmentVariableReader(@Nonnull
                                                Function<String,String> reader)
        Set a custom function to read environment variables with.
        Parameters:
        reader - A generic key-value mapping.
